doc.plot: An old WWII veteran reflects back on the events he experienced during his fight in the Battle of the Bulge. Told through the lives and eyes of men he fought with, this is a realistic depiction of the daily battles faced by the men who defended Bastogne from the from the German counter offensive during the winter of 1944.
